data.name: Real-Time Chat App
data.description: Socket.io‑powered chat application enabling real‑time messaging with a Node.js + Express backend and a responsive vanilla JS/HTML/CSS frontend.

data.name: Real-Time Weather Finder
data.description: Full‑stack weather dashboard fetching live conditions from the OpenWeatherMap API and displaying temperature, humidity, and a 5‑day forecast based on user search or geolocation.

data.name: Task Manager API
data.description: RESTful API for managing user‑specific task lists with JWT authentication, built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB with Mongoose.

data.name: To‑Do List App
data.description: Minimalist web application that lets users create, edit, and delete daily tasks; powered by vanilla JavaScript and persisted with a simple JSON backend.

data.name: Buy Books
data.description: Static e-commerce front end for browsing and purchasing books, built with pure HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript (no backend). Includes catalogue filtering, cart, and checkout flow handled entirely in-browser.
